en_US.project_summary: Omiga is an innovative inscription protocol established on the CKB. Meticulously designed the project to break from tradition and provide users with a fairer, more efficient inscription minting and management experience.

zh_CN.project_summary: Omiga 是建立在 CKB 区块链上的一项创新性铭文协议。通过精心设计，旨在突破传统，为用户提供更公平、更高效的代币铸造和资产管理体验。
